alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 8:34AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alameda and southeastern Contra Costa Counties through 900 AM PST... At 834 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunol, or near Union City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Hayward, Livermore, Pleasanton, Union City, Milpitas, Dublin, Newark, Sunol, Byron and Los Vaqueros. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
